alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:51PM CDT until July 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOUP AND CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 551 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, or 14 miles north of Burwell, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Valley View Flat Campground, Deverre and Hannamon Bayou Campground. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
